summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; authorizing an agreement with the United States of America, Dept. of Interior, acting by and through the Bonneville Power Administrator, for the coordination of the Boundary Hydroelectric Project (FPC License No. 2144) with the U.S. Columbia River Power System as required by Article 46 of the federal license for such project and providing for certain payments to the United States in connection therewith.
